h1: Before you upload your digital fit note

list.li1: Make sure your fit note is landscape (horizontal) not portrait (vertical).
list.li2: The whole fit note must be shown. It needs to be on 1 page.
list.li3: Check that it is in focus and all text can be read.
list.li4: It may be necessary to take a photo or crop it to create a landscape version.

fit-note-zoom-alt-text: An incorrect photograph of a zoomed in fit note and a correct clear photograph of a fit note
